A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: My favorite SW film. It took some risks and added nuance to our ideas about the Force. I was emotionally completely captivated by this movie. This movie took the story away from the nostalgia factory of TFA\, which was SO nice. Visually\, it was fantastic. The music? John Williams will never disappoint. There's only one bit of the film that I question\, but it doesn't take away from the movie enough for me to take away a star. Rian Johnson did an amazing job and gave us a fresh and deep new take. This SW fan greatly approves.
